code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [FinTech_AuthVault] --> INIT
  INIT --> HANDSHAKING: on_connected(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
  HANDSHAKING --> STREAMING: on_first_data(FinTech_AuthVault) / on_heartbeat(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
  STREAMING --> DRAINING: on_eof_sent(FinTech_LedgerService) / on_eof_received(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
  DRAINING --> TERMINATED: on_ack(FinTech_TransactionQueue) with no pending
  STREAMING --> FAILED: on_error(FinTech_AuthVault) / heartbeat timeout
  DRAINING --> FAILED: on_error(FinTech_LedgerService)
  HANDSHAKING --> FAILED: on_error(FinTech_LedgerService)
  TERMINATED --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
  FAILED --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]
  STREAMING --> STREAMING: on_frame_sent(FinTech_TransactionQueue) / ACK pending
  DRAINING --> DRAINING: pending ACKs remain
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
